title: Air New Zealand "Pleased to Seat You" Tour Showcases New 777-200 Products for North American Travelers
content:
SOURCE Air New Zealand

LOS ANGELES 

Traveling more than 7,000 miles, the Air New Zealand "Pleased to Seat You" Tour will be on the road Monday, September 14 

Fans who stop by one of the above "Pleased to Seat You" Tour locations during the designated date and time, and have their photo taken in the seats by an Air New Zealand brand ambassador, have a chance to win two roundtrip tickets to New Zealand 

For more information on the Air New Zealand "Pleased to Seat You" Tour and Sweepstakes, please visit www.airnz.com/seat-tour.

The refurbished Boeing 777-200 will operate Air New Zealand's Vancouver Vancouver Houston

For more information on Air New Zealand's award-winning products and routes, please visit www.airnewzealand.com.

*Special terms and conditions apply. Please visit www.airnz.com/seat-tour for official rules, terms and conditions. 

Issued by Air New Zealand. For more information contact: 

Charli Sharp, MWW Group, +1-213-402-1435

About Air New Zealand

Air New Zealand 

Air New Zealand is proud to be a member of Star Alliance. The Star Alliance network was established in 1997 as the first truly global airline alliance to offer worldwide reach, recognition and seamless service to the international traveller. Its acceptance by the market has been recognized by numerous awards, including the Air Transport World Market Leadership Award and Best Airline Alliance by both Business Traveller Magazine and Skytrax. The member airlines are: Adria Airways, Aegean Airlines, Air Canada, Air China, Air India, Air New Zealand, ANA, Asiana Airlines, Austrian, Avianca, Avianca in Brazil 

For more information about Air New Zealand visit www.airnewzealand.com and for more information about Star Alliance visit www.staralliance.com and/or follow Star Alliance on Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, LinkedIn or Instagram.
